title: HELP WITH RP!
body: If i buy a RP card in mexico will it work on the NA Server?

replies.body: A Mexican RP card is not usable on the NA servers. This is because [**RP cards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224) are all made for specific servers/regions. Your best bet would be to wait and buy those cards in the region where you're looking to use them, for example, buy NA RP cards if you need to use them on the NA region.

The RP cards should have written visibly on them which servers they work with, in this case NA
At the very least it should be in English (potentially with French as well since NA has to include some French-speaking parts of Canada) and use a dollar sign.
I think so. I don't see why not, my friend bought me ones in the bahamas and they still work ?
